creator: RJoy
descriptionHtml:
Puzzles & Commander is a war strategy game combined with match-3.

SLG meets match-3!
Solve puzzles to kill Satan Troops and rescue team Thor!

Build an impenetrable base!
In order to survive, you must construct buildings, train troops, produce resources, research technology and recruit Heroes with different skills. Build an impenetrable base and provide a safe haven for your allies.

Survival of the fittest!
Join or form an alliance and fight for freedom and justice.

The will to live!
With hideous enemies and an ever-looming crisis, it's kill or be killed.

Strategic battles!
Raid bases to sustain your own with a wide range of troop types, comprehensive Hero skills and powerful attacks combined with various battle strategies.

Unique heroes!
Realistic and interesting hero designs portraying survivors from different walks of life. Recruit talented heroes to defend your base and help lead your troops!

Commander, are you ready to report for duty and amass an army unlike any that has ever existed?

Note:
Puzzles & Commander is a free-to-play mobile game with in-app purchases.
A device with internet access is required.

Join us:

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/puzzlescommander
Discord:
https://discord.gg/aX8MQ7E8fS
descriptionShort: A clever fusion of match-3 gameplay and SLG gameplay of mobile games.

appDetails.developerAddress: 3 Themistocli Dervi Str., Julia House, 1066 Nicosia Cyprus
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New content
1. New game mode: Alien Invasion - Available after passing Campaign Chapter 4.
2. New Arena event: Commander Clash: Conquer - During the event period you can participate once your Headquarters reaches level 10.
3. New languages - French, German, Russian, Turkish, Spanish, Indonesian
Optimization
1. New UI artwork in selected areas.
2. Adjustment to the maximum number of speedup items that can be used in one go.
3. Other bug fixes

title: Puzzles & Commander

container.value: 3 Themistocli Dervi Str., Julia House, 1066 Nicosia Cyprus

creator: RJoy
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the most exciting war strategy match-3 puzzle game!

Immerse yourself in the world of war and adventures and take the role of the mighty commander. Choose the right strategy and instruct your Thor Team to defeat the Satan Troops. As a brave commander, you will conquer new lands and resources and enhance your territory, train your troops, construct buildings, research technology, produce resources, and recruit your Heroes with different skills.

Playing this realistic match-3 puzzle game, you will find the most attractive hero designs from different walks of life. Gross, Red Baron, Sergeant York, Yuri, Mr. E, Karuna, and many others will fight together to defeat the enemies. You will be able to recruit talented heroes and enhance your troops.

This unique match-3 game has a user-friendly interface, and you will feel like a movie hero.

Game Features:
●Classic Match-3 puzzle game – simple, strategically, and casual.
●Command a broad battlefield and lead your troops and heroes to defeat the enemies.
●Explore new territories with valuable resources and treasures.
●Collect and recruit new heroes – thousands of historical soldiers.
●Complete hundreds of levels and test your skills.
●Complete daily tasks and gain rewards.
It is your time to become a hero and build your safe and prosperous island!

Note:

Puzzle Commander is a free-to-play mobile game with in-app purchases.

A device with internet access is required.

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/puzzlescommander

Discord:
https://discord.gg/KjC2rSrKyW
descriptionShort: A clever fusion of match-3 gameplay and SLG gameplay of mobile games.

appDetails.developerAddress: 3 Themistocli Dervi Str., Julia House, 1066 Nicosia Cyprus
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New​
1. New function - Visiting, you can visit another commanders' sanctuary.​
2. New 5* Hero - Joseph.​
3. Added more flags, tap on the flag inside your avatar to view the changes.​

Optimization​
1. Optimize the world map quick selection function, quick selection will now automatically select recommended heroes.​
2. Reset heroes at level 30 or below for free.​

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
